title: Incorrect 'Build' popup action enablement
description: In the Java perspective, the 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu is always enabled, even if the user has selected 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' in Preferences > Workbench. This behavior is incorrect.
OB: The 'Build' action in the Java perspective's context-sensitive popup menu is always enabled, regardless of the 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' setting in Preferences > Workbench.
EB: The 'Build' action in the Java perspective's context-sensitive popup menu should be disabled when the 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' setting is enabled. This prevents the need for manual builds when the build is already done automatically.
SR:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences > Workbench.
3. Select the 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' option.
4. Right-click on any element in the Java perspective.
5. Verify that the 'Build' action is disabled in the context-sensitive popup menu.
